content:
TERM: Human-Machine Interface

DEFINITION:
Human-Machine Interface: Voice Recognition:

Gesture Recognition:

Augmented Reality:

By integrating advanced HMI technologies into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to interact with users in a more intuitive and effective way, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of advanced data visualization and business intelligence tools to enable the system to provide insights and trends in complex data.

Confidence: 2.875
